item.title: Revisiting My Workplace Manifesto
item.description: In July 2013, I posted my workplace manifesto on a Tumblr blog I had back then. It was a list of five priorities I wanted for a current – or future workplace; some of them felt a bit far-fetched or maybe even utopian, so how do they stack up today? The Manifesto Without further ado here is the manifesto: Be able to work on projects that excite you! Be able to put in the hours to finish the project and NOT be bound by the project’s price-tag.
